title: Tomcat throws exception and refuses to shut down during shutting down - NullPointerException in JDK14LoggerAdapter fillCallerData
description:
I was running an optimize on this Solr server running in tomcat, when I ran a shutdown command. The server refused to disappear from the processlist at which point I looked at the log. Here it is:


INFO: SolrDeletionPolicy.onInit: commits:num=2
